document:
<sentence id="s1" text="Herein, we designed a retro-inverso isomer of lsup>Lc(cell-cell signaling-1), termed lsup>Dc(LyP-1), expecting to inspire brain metastatic tumor targeted drug delivery.">
<sentence id="s2" text="Further, lsup>Lc(cell-cell signaling-1) modified PEG-PLA micelles displayed much higher in vivo distribution in brain metastatic tumor than lsup>Dc(LyP-1).">
<sentence id="s3" text="All results suggested that lsup>Lc(cell-cell signaling-1) had a better performance than lsup>Dc(LyP-1) in brain metastatic tumor-targeted drug delivery">
